review_text:
We stayed here along our cross country Roadtrip with our 2 dogs! This place was absolutely lovely. It’s tucked into a cute suburban neighborhood that is so peaceful and quiet. The tiny home itself was very beautiful & had everything you could possibly need for your stay. We even cooked our dinner on the stove with the provided kitchenware. Devon is an amazing host, very responsive and attentive.
Don’t forget to say hello to StreetTaco the neighborhood stray kitty :)
adorable little guest house, very clean and homey. Host was interactive and friendly it was very appreciated. would recommend a stay
Devon's home was darling!! Furnished great. Perfect little getaway!
Adorable place! Made me wish I was staying longer!

Great place to stay in a nice and peaceful neighborhood. Guest house was clean, and the amenities were good. I will definitely stay here again when I come back in town. Devon was a great host: friendly, responsive, and easy going.
The only things I'll note that might be an issue for some people are these two things:
- If you use the restroom a lot like I do throughout the night, then you do have to go downstairs to use it. The bedroom is upstairs.
- The shower is small. For me it wasn't an issue, but if you're a person that needs some space to shower, then it'll be a tight squeeze.
Awesome host. Short stay, and felt right at home. Would stay again, if I’m ever in the area. Thanks!
As a host, I love to travel to cool little places. Devon was an awesome host and I look forward to coming back soon. I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

Great place! Everything was as expected, including some extra touches snacks, recommendations and easy parking. It is vey private easy walk to the lake and close drive to all types of places. Would definitely stay again.
Super responsive! She was a great host!
Very nice place. Clean and decorated very well. Only issue was the small bed!

This place was absolutely adorable! It’s a cute little hidden gem. It was so clean, had everything that was listed, and had many lists that had restaurant recommendations and fun things to do. There was even a little treat basket right when I walked inside. I thoroughly enjoyed reading on the porch in the evening.
Clean place, comfortable stay.
I was so worried traveling across country with my pet cats, but Devon assured me everything would be fine, and it was purrrfect! We loved this place and wholeheartedly recommend it for everyone.
We loved it! Devon was so responsive anytime I had questions. The house was so cute and very clean. I can’t wait to stay there again. I’d definitely recommend it.

I stayed here on a roadtrip from FL to CO for my wedding, liked it so much I stayed again on the way back! Devon is so sweet and thoughtful, she left us a card with a small champagne bottle. Don’t hesitate, book with Devon!
Wonderful stay. Devon’s place is so cute and just right for us and our pup in an overnight stay. We would definitely stay here again!
My daughter found Devon’s home lovely and quaint! We needed a spot for one night and Devon’s home did not disappoint! Highly recommend… Devon is a very responsive host! Till next time

Devon was the best & very responsive! The "Little House" is super cute and homey! You could see the warm heart of this host in how well she arranged the home. It has a full kitchen, the bathroom was clean, & the bed was comfy. It’s in a great location, very quiet, and peaceful. I was there for an annual dog obedience trial with my English Springer Spaniel and we were very comfortable there. It is perfect for one/two people & one/two pets. The parking is very convenient and getting in is quite easy. I am so glad I found her place and will definitely be back!! :)
Super responsive and flexible which was very important as I was needing early access to prep for Valentine's. Use of space was amazing, area was quiet! Would stay again 100%

Devon's place was a comfortable place for us to rest our heads for a night on a roadtrip from FL to CO with our dogs. Check-in and parking were simple, and the neighborhood was safe. Nice neighborhood with sidewalks for walking the dogs.
Super cute small house with balcony. Nicely decorated and appointed. Quiet neighborhood allowed us to sleep well Great places to walk my dog nearby.
This place is so cute! It was perfect for my husband and I (and our dog). It’s very stylish yet comfortable. I highly recommend this place.
Was a great place to stop on our road trip, the area was very quiet, and peaceful. We would stay again.
Such a lovely place for my dog and I for an overnight as we traveled through on a long road trip. I loved the aesthetic and comfort—and I slept great!

This was a solo trip for me.. felt super safe not only
In the neighborhood but in the Air B&B! House was perfect! Will definitely stay again!
Such a great stay. Well decorated, easy access, and quiet.

I've stayed at the Little House twice, and my pets and I are very comfortable there. It is perfect for one or two people and one or two pets. It has all the amenities that you would want. The parking is very convenient and getting in is quite easy. I would definitely stay again!

It was a friggin night, and they were so thoughtful that had a heating blanket on the bed when I arrived. They also had a few heaters to help with the frigid temperatures outside! This place is beautiful and was above my expectations. They have a lot of shelving and closet space with different type of uses. The space is very well arranged and it is beautiful. Also, the attention of the host and her father were top-notch. You could see the kindness of this host in how well she arranged the place and the detail to service that I experience you on my arrival after a horrible winter weather drive. After driving 12 hours this was just what I needed. Thank you for your kindness!
Had a great stay. In a nice neighborhood with large sidewalks for walking the dogs and green space available nearby. Clean, comfortable, quiet, easy to find.

Devon is a wonderful host. She was very prompt in her responses, the place was absolutely the cutest little house I’ve ever seen & so clean! My pup and I were passing through after the Christmas holidays and wanted something a little more roomy than a hotel. The place is exactly as described & pictured and the bed was very comfy. After check out, we went to a dog park just about 5 minutes away. We will definitely be back should we ever pass through the area again!

This was our 2nd time staying at Devon’s place, and we fully enjoyed it once again! Easy to find and access, good shower and bed, and everything else you might need. Devon is very responsive and an excellent host. We highly recommend!
The house was very comfortable, cute and nice place. Perfect for 1 to 2 people. I would recommend the house to anyone.
Nice quiet stop over in Wichita Falls. Would stop over again
Great little place- easy to find and clean. Would recommend

Devon's place was the perfect spot for a weekend for two in Wichita Falls. It was such a cute little house, and kept very clean. I booked for my mom's birthday weekend, and Devon went above and beyond, providing a cupcake, candles and birthday card for my mom upon arrival! She was quick to respond to any questions, and I would definitely recommend to others!

Devon was the sweetest and so so flexible! She let us check in early and made it so easy for us. The place is super cute and homey! It has a full kitchen so we were able to cook dinner. It’s in a great location, too! I grew up in WF and lived in a house right around the corner so I can vouch for how great the location is! The bathroom was clean, bed was comfy, and there’s a tiny heater that worked so well I bought one for my own house!! We will definitely be back!! :)
Second time staying at The Little House! We love it here, us and our dogs are always comfy.

Our stay at Devon's Little House was such a restful and beautiful place. Everything was perfect for us, and the sunrises were so breathtaking! Thank you Devon, for providing us the perfect Little House to stay in!

This is how all Airbnb’s should be! Exactly as described, quiet neighborhood, no hassles, super cute, comfy bed/pillows, and best of all no ridiculous cleaning fees or list of chores to do before leaving. 100% enjoyable stay and I’d for sure stay there again.
This place is great. Quite nice neighbor hood, good parking. Easy to find. Would stay again.
Loved it so much! Wether you book for a weekend get away or a longer stay this place is perfect!

We're so glad we found Devon's place. It was perfect for the two of us and our little dog. We felt completely comfortable and cozy and were impressed with the design and décor of the house. We had several walks in the neighborhood found it to be clean and safe. In addition, Devon was the friendliest and most responsive host. Her email messages made me smile! We'll definitely stay again next time we go through Wichita Falls. Thanks, Devon!

Devon's place was grear. I stayed for a little under 2 weeks, and it had everything I needed. It did not have a washer and dryer but there are plenty of safe laundromats in the area! Devon was 100% responsive to any inquiry I had! 10/10 would come back!

Cute place! Neat as a pin with cool, modern design. Very clean. Just right for a couple. Comfy bed. Situated on quiet neighborhood cul-de-sac. The air conditioner ran a bit loud for me…may not be a problem for those who prefer that type of background noise while sleeping.
Super responsive, very helpful, comfortable bed. Totally worth recommending!

Looking for a quick and painless stay for the night while moving across the country and Devon made it as painless and seamless as possible. Very attentive and location/amenities is just as advertised. Couldn’t be happier with the stay
Devon was so sweet and responsive when I had questions! The place was beautiful and just what we needed for a night away!
Devon’s place was perfect for what was needed! Great location and easy check in!

What an adorable place! Just the right size for us and the pets! Couldn’t ask for better communication from the host. Everything was tidy and clean, with sweet and thoughtful little items provided. We have already recommended this place to our family for future road trips.

So
Much better than staying in a hotel.
The place was awesome, Devon was awesome. Overall a great stay!
Very nice cottage next to the main house in a quiet neighboorhood near town. We enjoyed our stay.
We had a great stay that we had to extend due to our vehicle having issues. Devon was very flexible and considerate of our needs. Highly recommend this property and owner!
Great stopping point on a road trip, super easy to find/get into upon arrival late at night. AC didn’t get very cool even though we had both on and turned down low is my only complaint

This little house is absolutely adorable. Tastefully decorated, well-maintained. The air conditioners were a little noisy at full tilt, but it was one of the hottest years on record, and I am eternally grateful that they were there. Would definitely stay here again.
Very nice comfortable place. Creatively decorated. Enjoyed our stay.
The place was nice and represented what was in the advertised pictures.

We booked Devon’s cozy space and it was the perfect place to get some rest on our way to Taos! The space was so peaceful and clean. She provided clear instructions for access and such. Highly recommend!
Enjoyed my stay at Devon’s stopping through Wichita Falls on a road trip. Would stay here again!
It was our anniversary weekend and she even left us a card for our anniversary! She is amazing! We will stay here again!

We stayed here for one night as we made our way to Colorado. It was so nice to stay in a quiet neighborhood instead of a busy motel. The little house was easy to find, quiet and the bed was amazingly comfortable. We had our dogs with us and they enjoyed walking the neighborhood. The kitchen was stocked perfectly for us and we cooked a light meal there easily. We loved the 2nd floor balcony. Loved the nail bar idea upstairs - so unique and fun! Would definitely stay there again!
Great place to stay!
Cozy stay for the whole family…including the furry ones! Devon was very informative and friendly with instructions. Great experience!
Devon was super easy to work with! Check-in and out was simple and the place was in the perfect location for us. It was great to be at a nice small place for a couple days!

Such a wonderful little home. Very clean, easy to find and with clear check-in instructions. Devon was very responsive and helped to accommodate my very late check-in.
Everything in the home was in excellent condition. Perfectly priced, pet-friendly and a very responsive host.
Bed was comfortable, bathroom was clean and well stocked. Kitchen was great and the welcome snacks were a welcome treat. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
WE stayed ofr one night - the flat had a comfortable bed and all that you needed.
Great place to stay. My daughter was at Sheppard AFB and great place to stay and visit. Very convenient.
This was the cutest place ever! A lovely quiet suburb, great for walking our dog. The house was very clean and adorably decorated. Highly recommend!

The place was a great stay for us. Definitely turn on both ac units and put fans in front of them to circulate cold air when you arrive. Texas heat is brutal!! If you don't do stairs well, note that the bed is upstairs and the restroom is downstairs. Not a problem for us. House was cute and just what we needed for a rest for the evening.

Devon's little house is darling and had plenty of room for my husband, myself and our pup. It is nestled in a quiet neighborhood and in the perfect location for an overnight stay on our cross county trip. We will definitely be back the next time through. Thanks for hosting us, Devon!
LOVED our stay at Devon’s place, just needed somewhere to stay for the weekend and it was perfect! The house was awesome and she was super friendly and always responding quickly to any questions.
lovely little cozy home in a peaceful neighborhood. the residents were friendly and the hosts had everything I would need.. the nail bar🥰 loved it!!!
Devon was very responsive and worked with us checking in late. Her place is perfect for travelers with pets. We would definitely stay at her place again.
It was such a lovely and cute home! I enjoyed staying there a lot and it was just as described.

Our 3rd stay here. As always, Devon was the perfect host.
A great layover on our trips into Central Texas.
We would definitely stay here again if passing through.
Great quiet place to stay! Very comfortable! Devon was very responsive. Would definitely recommend.

Devon's small house was very nice, stylishly decorated, and extremely clean...which is very important to me. It's also located near Lake Wichita Park and the bike trail there. You can start there and go all the way to Lucy Park. It's a beautiful ride through grassland. It's very peaceful and felt safe as I was alone. Devon's place is located in a very quiet neighborhood too.
We had such a good weekend at Devon’s airbnb! She was very friendly and so accommodating! It was a very quiet neighborhood and we felt very safe. I would recommend this airbnb every time!
Great Airbnb & communication. My husband myself & my dog were very happy with Devon’s house it had everything we needed thank you for hosting
Really enjoyed staying at the Little House. Highly recommend.
We had a wonderful stay! Such a cute little house with tons of space! Thank you again!

It's a cute little house in a quiet neighborhood, very clean and cutely decorated. There is a really nice bicycle trail that can be reached from the house by cycling on a few neighborhood streets. Devon was a great host allowing me to check in early and responding quickly to my messages.

We had a great stay at Devon’s place. The house had everything we needed, we appreciated being able to cook up our own meal. The bed was comfortable and we slept well! The area felt very safe and after lots of driving, we appreciated being able to stretch our legs around the neighbourhood. We would stay again if we were passing through!

I really enjoyed the little house. It was very clean and welcoming. Devin was very responsive and amiable. The house itself was great but little, so I’d stick with the host’s recommendation for number of guests. Good neighborhood for walking, etc. The location was convenient and quiet. I really appreciated the pet friendly accommodation. Yes, I would definitely recommend and yes, I would stay again :)
The place was perfect. Devon responded quickly and provided suggestions on tons of great local favorites from food to axe throwing (plus a few delicious snacks:)
Great place to stay when in town!
Devon is a great host. Definitely would recommend her place to stay at. 💛
in love with this place :))

This little house was perfect for me and my little family (fiancé and fur baby). It was so cozy and wonderfully decorated. Devon’s communication couldn’t have been better. She was so easy to talk to and extremely helpful when we had to adjust our dates of travel last minute. We enjoyed ourselves so much and will definitely come back the next time we are in the area. Thank you Devon!!
The CUTEST Airbnb
This was the cutest place for my family to stay! Very clean, so many thoughtful amenities and incredibly pet friendly. I would recommend this place to any couple with pets.
quiet and cozy, I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Very nice place to stay. I happen to stay when the weather was very cold so it took a while to heat up the place with portable heaters. That was the only downside. Everything else was good!

Enjoyed my stay at Devon’s. I was traveling across country with my dog and cat and they felt at ease which helped me relax as well. Devon was friendly and helpful with instructions for getting checked in. Much better than staying in a hotel.
solid location in a peaceful area. close enough to local restaurants and bars. would stay there again
Great experience! It’s a lovely home and super welcoming

Enjoyed our stay. Nicely decorated. Lots of storage. Kind of drafty but we stayed warm enough. Parking is a little tricky but you get to use the driveway. Very close to main house but wasn’t a problem. Felt safe. Good overnight stop.
Definitely will be back when visiting the area. 1000% better than any hotel 🤩
Devon is very hospitable and friendly and the house was very clean. We really enjoyed our stay in this little charismatic house.

Loved the space. Such cute touches and made such smart decisions on the layout, storage, arrangement,etc… So cute, clean, and inviting. Loved the interior. Stairs were nice and wide and the LED lights were just the perfect touch. Would recommend to anyone!

Devon’s place was perfect! It was so clean and cozy. I loved the decorations all throughout the house. It also had everything I could have needed. I would 10/10 recommend her place. If I’m ever in the area again I’ll definitely be back!
It was great staying there, host was quick to respond to messages & very nice!
Just as described and a great place for us to stop in on our drive back to Denver, Colorado :)
We stayed in the little house as a short stop in our road trip. Devon’s place is very clean and convenient, there is a full kitchen as well. We enjoyed our stay, highly recommend!
This was our second stay at this property. Everything was as expected. We love the little house and we are already re-booked to come back in May.

This was a great place to stop by on a road trip back to California! It was very comfortable for my boyfriend, dog and I. Clean, well equipped and so nicely decorated for a cozy stay. Would definitely stay again if I visit Wichita Falls in the future!
Excellent stay. Super clean, easy and flexible check-in, and tastefully decorated. This is a great spot with outstanding value. Highly recommended!
Great place for a short stop, small but sweet! will come back again.

What a cute and cozy place. The design of the property was well thought out and maximized the space. The place was beautifully furnished. The neighborhood felt safe. The area was nice to close to a lot of things. I would highly recommend this Air BnB and I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Devon!
Great place to stay for us and the pups! Conveniently located while driving through.
Perfect place to stop on our long road trip! Very comfortable and had everything you could need. Our dog felt right at home too! We would definitely stay here again.
The place was just as described, and was super clean. Great location at a really great price!

we loved staying at the tiny house with our dog. it was super clean and exceeded our expectations. devon was great to work with and the house was stocked with everything we needed, including great recommendations. yes the place is small, but it is so efficiently designed that it felt very roomy and comfortable. we’d definitely stay here again!

Thanks again, Devon, for another terrific stay! I appreciate your thoughtful touches and hospitality! I so appreciate your flexibility with checking in and out when possible as well as making sure all is going well for my stays!
Devon's little house 🏡 is beautiful, cozy and an amazing place to stay. Definitely, recommended is you are staying in Wichita Falls area and definitely we will come back ❣️

What a fantastic stay! The little house was aesthetically pleasing and immaculately clean! I hope we come through Wichita Falls so we can stay here again ❤️ Wonderful communication! No cleaning fee! A+!
Devon's place is a great example of why I love Airbnb. She's a perfect host and went out of her way to accommodate me for my stay. Love the house and the host. Thank you!
Absolutely stunning home, wonderful running trail, you even get a goodie basket as soon as you walk into the little house
We loved this sweet place! Devon communicated beautifully and the house was immaculate. We loved it! We want to come back and stay. We highly recommend it.
Perfect place for a quick pit stop, Devon was very accommodating. Thank you Devon!
Cute little place that with a great layout. Comfortable and very clean! There are nice personal touches and great communication. This is our second time to stay here.
This house was exactly what we needed! It was very tidy and cute. The welcome basket that was left was a very thoughtful touch that made the experience that much better!

Devon was incredibly accommodating and just such a sweet person. We had zero issues with our stay, and are so very grateful for how comfortable and spotless the Little House was. Pet friendly, extra toiletries, awesome decorating, and even a deck. This place had it all. Don’t hesitate to book your stay here!!!
Great value and a fantastic place to stay with pets when passing through! House is cute and Devon was very communicative.

Perfectly positioned for a restful stop for a cross-country road trip.
5 minute drive from Wichita Falls park, very large and perfect if you want a long walk with your dog. The neighborhood around the home was very safe to walk in for shorter walks.
Bed was very comfortable and temperature was easy to control. Thoughtful coffee setup and gift of snacks upon arrival. Devon was a wonderful host.
It’s such a nice, little cozy house that is in an amazing area! Would definitely stay here again!!!
Great house, location & host. 5 star ⭐️
This house is so cute! Very clean, in a great neighborhood and very spacious. Devon is an amazing host very attentive and welcoming! The picture don’t do it justice. I enjoyed my stay!
Great comfortable place. Devon is a great host.
We had a short but wonderful stay at The Little House. Very pet friendly, beautifully decorated and very comfy. Would love to be back soon.

I was traveling through and had my dog with me it was a perfect one night stay the location was easy to find off the main Highway and was in a nice neighborhood and a cul-de-sac so very private I felt safe and it was very clean, I would stay again and the hostess was very responsive to any questions I had

This place was so cool! Very easy to find and equipped well. Devon makes sure that feel welcome when you arrive and responds very quickly should you need anything. My pupper mastered the stairs here and now he’s a champ. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it. Thanks for a great stay in Wichita Falls!!

Our second time to stay here because it’s cute, comfortable, reasonably priced, safe, and Devon the host is great!!
We actually live down the street about 2 minutes away but have used it when our AC went out and had wood floors put in and so blessed to have it to use! I can promise you it’s a safe area. To me that is everything! Thanks again Devon for another great stay and for being super sweet and helpful!

Very comfortable private and in a quiet area, except for the coyotes hollaring late at night while we were on the balcony....I've never heard them do that!
So it was a plus experience !+!

The Little House was just as promised. Cute and comfy. It is a short drive to Arrowhead State Park, where I hiked during the day. It was nice to return to a cool and well stocked home and a good shower. The host was very accommodating, leaving a welcome basket with some goodies and coffee pods. The Keurig was a welcome site! The home is decorated nicely with 2 hanging chairs outside. Quiet neighborhood and easy access!
This cute tiny house is a treasure in Wichita Falls. I’ve stayed a few times for an annual bicycle ride. It’s very welcoming and comfortable.
Wonderful, comfy and cozy and great location. Thank you!
The cutest place to stay, it was so cozy, super clean and had everything we needed. Felt right at home.

The Little House is a really cute little place. Was kinda warm (but hey, it's Wichita Falls in August) but there are fans and A/C units that help keep it comfortable. Made it a touch noisy, but necessary. Really nice location and great value. A safe, wide walking path is just outside. Will definitely be back.
This little house was perfect for our short stay and would've been great for an even longer one--well equipped, cozy yet spacious. Communication and check-in were easy. Thanks Devon!

I was pleasantly surprised by how nice this place was. Nice living room and loft bedroom. The kitchen was fully stocked and there was also ice in the freezer and coffee. The bed was comfortable too. It was too hot to spend much time outside, but there was a private balcony and some hanging patio chairs that would be very enjoyable in cooler weather. The AC also did it's job.
perfect place to stay with your fur babies!

Very cute tiny home! My family of three stayed here as we are traveling across the country with our cats. It made for a very cozy night stay! Everything is as pictured, if not even cuter in person. Extremely clean and detail oriented. Communication was great! Would stay again if we're ever in the area.
Devon has a nicely decorated and fully equipped house to share on a very quiet and private cul-de-sac.
Was a perfect stay with everything I needed!
Amazing stay! Everything very accurate to photos. Communication great. Great little place for 2 people. Very cozy and clean.

Cute little house and my family enjoyed staying there! Safe and great location too.
Devon is very helpful and so sweet!!
We will be back:)

Loved the little house! Perfect place for a break after a long drive. Had everything we needed. Located in a very convenient neighborhood. Our dog loved it too. Really appreciated the dinner suggestions. Will definitely be back!

This was honestly my favorite Airbnb stay ever. It was extremely clean and cozy. She even left a cute welcome basket with snacks and lists of places to visit within the area. It was one of the most welcoming places I’ve ever stayed. She was very sweet and accommodating. 10/10 for sure.

Absolutely loved this Airbnb! It was perfect for my short stay in Wichita Falls. It was in a nice and peaceful neighborhood. Devon was an excellent host responding promptly to any questions or inquiries I had. If I ever find myself visiting Wichita Falls again, I would definitely book here again.
This is a great place! Highly recommend!

Traveling from Idaho to Florida with a friend and her dog and this was one of our many stops. The little house is a perfect place to relax and get a good nights rest. We really enjoyed our stay. Definitely recommend to anyone who is looking into this place!
Devon was one of the best communicators I’ve ever stayed with! The little house was very clean, well stocked and a great location with easy access to the main roads. We would definitely stay again!
Book it!! This guest house is so cute! Perfect for a weekend get away!

If you’re going through Wichita Falls, especially with your fur baby, this is the place to stay. The price point was great. It felt very spacious. Bed was comfortable. Our favorite part was watching the 4th of July fireworks from the balcony and then enjoying our morning coffee out there before we hit the road again. Devon had a great list of local places and was excellent with communication.
Great stay for a short weekend trip. Everything you may need and Devon is super quick at responding and offering assistance if you need it!
Neat, cozy and pet friendly place. Our cat and we loved our stay!
This is the cutest little house and it even has a chill balcony! Everything was immaculate and Devon was great with communicating. Close to everything you need. Would stay again anytime.
Very quiet and cute little place. We enjoyed our overnight stay.

Just like the previous time we stayed here, the place was just what we needed. Devon is the greatest Airbnb host. She knows how to make people feel welcome. Her place has all the extra touches one could imagine. The "little house" is just right.
Perfection!

Cute little house! If you’ve ever been to Ikea you’ll feel like you’re in an IKEA showroom (which was fine with us- we love Ikea). We didn’t stay long enough to need the kitchen but it had all the appliances, dishes, spices to make a meal if we needed. The night lights on the stairs helped during the night. The wicker swings were nice in the early evening. Close to the highway. Safe neighborhood. Very good find!!

I would highly recommend Devon' cute little house! The location is very walkable for you and your pet.
Super clean, well appointed and well stocked with everything that you would need. Highly recommend!
Very cute place and decorated very nicely. Devon was amazing and very responsive. I would absolutely recommend anyone to stay here!

Awesome place for a quiet stay. The decorations are beautiful the place is so adorable and it has a very relaxing deck and some patio chairs that face East if you want to watch the sunrise. There were bunnies in the yard as well.
Very well comfortable, I highly recommend 😊
A lovely home in a nice area. We stayed one quick night and were out early in the morning, but we enjoyed our stay. The home is precious and comes stocked with all the necessities.

We passed through Wichita Falls for a move and had a '16 foot Penske truck. Devon made sure the truck was accommodated for by making space in their driveway. We felt extra safe with our belongings there in the cul de sac neighborhood.
Cute little spot! Very comfy and convenient. Clean, with nice little touches. Friendly service. We will definitely rent again.
The Little House was wonderful! We had such a great stay and the host was SO accommodating!
This is a great place, in the best location, and the host was thoughtful with recommendations. The space was clean and amazing as advertised.

The little house was amazing. Devon was a great host!
We will definitely stay there again!

We enjoyed our stay at Devon’s place. It was cute, clean, and well-stocked. The only caution I’d give is if you’re severely allergic or reactive to air fresheners or artificial fragrances like I am, maybe message Devon ahead of time to let her know. There was a wax warmer plugged in when we arrived that I unplugged immediately and was able to manage through the night, but Devon was kind and accommodating in other ways and I think this is something you could be open with her about. Otherwise no complaints whatsoever!

Devon's place is just as she says, its really a nice little place to stay if you are in Wichita Falls on business or just visiting. Devon is a great host and was so awesome to work with. We defiantly recommend staying at her little house if you plan a trip to Wichita Falls.

This tiny Little House is on a quiet cul de sac in a lovely neighborhood. It is tastefully decorated and the bedroom on the second floor has an extremely comfortable bed, but best of all….there is a private balcony to enjoy your morning wake up cup of coffee. If you are an early riser you will get to enjoy many birds cavorting and swooping around the trees in the neighboring yards. I loved the view into all of the neighbors’ yards and got to see a happy little girl swinging in a hammock with her puppy while I was doing my morning Chi Qong exercises in the early morning sun.

Devon’s place was super cute and cozy. It was perfect for a one night stay with our dogs as we were passing through the area. Devon was also super communicative and sent awesome food recommendations. I would definitely recommend their place if you enjoy tiny houses.
Devon was so accommodating and communicative!! Had a great experience- everything was absolutely great and I would 10/10 recommend booking with her! (:

We absolutely loved our stay! Devon was quick to respond, when contacted, and provided clear communication throughout our booking period. The home itself was exactly as pictured, with plenty of local suggestions provided by the owner. The place was super clean, and everything we needed was provided.
I would definitely recommend and/ or stay again!
Devon was a great host. The airbnb was clean, organized, & spacious enough for two. If we ever find ourselves back in Wichita Falls, we will definitely book with Devon again! :)
Amazing stay like always! Very clean and cozy. Nice neighborhood.
Everything was very clean and all one could need was there!
We enjoyed our stay. The house was very clean and smelled great! Devon was very responsive. Loved the goodies in the welcome basket. Nice quiet neighborhood for a stroll. Would stay again!
Nice and clean little place in a quiet neighborhood. Was the perfect spot to stop for the night.

Located in a safe, quite neighborhood, this little house was absolutely perfect. Devon is a wonderful host who responds quickly to any communication. I look forward to staying again sometime.
